title: Marc's Hot Mic on RHOA + RHONJ Reunion AND Hannah Berner (Summer House)
itunes:title: Marc's Hot Mic on RHOA + RHONJ Reunion AND Hannah Berner (Summer House)
itunes:subtitle: Danny recaps this week's Real Housewives of Atlanta, which featured M*rc's charity event and Eva's baby shower. He also touches down on the Real Housewives of New Jersey reunion, AND Hannah Berner from Bravo's Summer House stops by ...
description:
Danny recaps this week's Real Housewives of Atlanta, which featured M*rc's charity event and Eva's baby shower. He also touches down on the Real Housewives of New Jersey reunion, AND Hannah Berner from Bravo's Summer House stops by (and her co-star Luke calls in) to talk about the new season.


Hannah Berner Interview: 28:51ish


FOR TICKETS TO EVERYTHING ICONIC LIVE, VISIT https://everythingiconic.com/live-shows
